#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll t,lcnt,ocnt,findex,lindex,flag,res;
    string str;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>str;
        lcnt=ocnt=0;flag=0;res=0;
        int len=str.length();

        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(str[i]=='L'){res=res+ocnt;lcnt++;}
            else if(str[i]=='O')ocnt+=lcnt;
        }
        cout<<res<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
